creator: glennmaughan@optushome.com.au
text:
The following stack trace occurs when executing a junitreport task on a set of 
junit XML result files.

The parsing phase works correctly and the aggregate XML result file is 
generated correctly.

I have not modified the XSL templates.


[junitreport] Applying 'all-packages.xsl'. 
Generating 'C:\projects\home\Impl\reports\html\all-packages.html'
SystemId Unknown; Line 0; Column 0; org.xml.sax.SAXException: SAX Exception
 at org.apache.xalan.xslt.XSLTEngineImpl.error(XSLTEngineImpl.java:1528)
 at org.apache.xalan.xslt.XSLTEngineImpl.error(XSLTEngineImpl.java:1493)
 at org.apache.xalan.xslt.XSLTEngineImpl.process(XSLTEngineImpl.java:525)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer.transform
(AggregateTransformer.java:460)
 at 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer.createPackageL
ist(AggregateTransformer.java:310)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer.transform
(AggregateTransformer.java:233)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLResultAggregator.execute
(XMLResultAggregator.java:169)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:153)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.runTarget(Project.java:898)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTarget(Project.java:536)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTargets(Project.java:510)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.runBuild(Main.java:421)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.main(Main.java:149)
 at de.bogdoll.ot.antrunner.AntRunner$AntRun.runInternal(AntRunner.java:1051)
 at de.bogdoll.ot.antrunner.AntRunner$AntRun.run(AntRunner.java:1012)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:484)

BUILD FAILED

C:\projects\home\Impl\application\project\..\..\build.xml:381: Errors while 
applying transformations
--- Nested Exception ---
org.xml.sax.SAXException: SAX Exception
 at org.apache.xalan.xslt.XSLTEngineImpl.error(XSLTEngineImpl.java:1528)
 at org.apache.xalan.xslt.XSLTEngineImpl.error(XSLTEngineImpl.java:1493)
 at org.apache.xalan.xslt.XSLTEngineImpl.process(XSLTEngineImpl.java:525)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer.transform
(AggregateTransformer.java:460)
 at 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer.createPackageL
ist(AggregateTransformer.java:310)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer.transform
(AggregateTransformer.java:233)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLResultAggregator.execute
(XMLResultAggregator.java:169)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:153)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.runTarget(Project.java:898)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTarget(Project.java:536)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTargets(Project.java:510)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.runBuild(Main.java:421)
 at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.main(Main.java:149)
 at de.bogdoll.ot.antrunner.AntRunner$AntRun.runInternal(AntRunner.java:1051)
 at de.bogdoll.ot.antrunner.AntRunner$AntRun.run(AntRunner.java:1012)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:484)

Total time: 0 seconds

creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
Should be fixed, it was possibly due to a problem while setting a systemid 
that was confusing the xsl processor.
I'd be glad to know if you can reproduce it with the next nightly build.
